name: markdown-paste-image
description: Paste Image in markdown from clipboard
author: Chris Towles

markdownPasteImage.imageFolderPath.description: The destination to save image file.  You can use variable ${currentFileDir} and ${projectRoot}. ${currentFileDir} will be replace by the path of directory that contain current editing file. ${projectRoot} will be replace by path of the project opened in vscode.

markdownPasteImage.defaultImageName.description: The default image file name. The value of this config will be pass to the 'format' function of Luxon library, you can read document https://moment.github.io/luxon/#/formatting?id=table-of-tokens for usage.

markdownPasteImage.imageNamePrefix.description: The string prepend to the image file name.

markdownPasteImage.imageNameSuffix.description: The string append to the image file name.

markdownPasteImage.imageUriPathPrefix.description: The string prepend to the resolved image path. Can be used if you want to supply a custom domain to image url.

markdownPasteImage.imageUriPathSuffix.description: The string append to the resolved image path. Can be used if you want to supply a custom params to image url.

markdownPasteImage.encodePath.description: The string append to the image file name. How to encode image path before insert to editor. Support options: none, urlEncode, urlEncodeSpace

markdownPasteImage.insertPattern.description: The pattern of string that would be pasted to text.

markdownPasteImage.showFilePathConfirmIn.description: Set to true if you want to be able to change the file path or name prior to saving the file to disk

markdownPasteImage.filePathConfirmInputB.description: Set the mode of file path confirm input box
